articles.content: Sony Alpha 1 full-frame mirrorless camera has launched in India and it is touted by the company as its most advanced and innovative camera. It features a 50.1-megapixel full-frame stacked Exmor RS im… [+2450 chars]

articles.title: Motorola Edge S With Dual Selfie Cameras, Snapdragon 870 SoC Launched: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Motorola Edge S with quad rear cameras has been launched in China. The Motorola phone also comes with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 870 SoC and features dual selfie cameras.
